bibl.title: Leroy Smith v. O.P. Halligan. Return on Service of Writ.
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

msIdentifier.repository: National Archives and Records Administration, Seattle Branch, Washington
msIdentifier.collection: RG 21 US District Court Western Division of Washington, Seattle

org.placeName: Western District of Washington Northern Division

div1.p: United States of America, Western District of Washington } ss:

I hereby certify and return that I served the annexed Writ of Habeas Corpus on the therein-named O P. Hilligan.Warden, by handing to and leaving a true and correct copy thereof with John, Talley, Deputy Warden and in charge. personally at McNiels Island Wash in said District on the 18th day of October, A.D. 1916
Marshals Fees $2,60 By John T. Secrist Deputy.
